sentence.Network_en: You became delusional and attacked several people trying to escape.
sentence.Network_cn: 你产生了错觉并攻击了许多人还试图逃走.

sentence.Network_en: He is incoherent, delusional, suffering auditory hallucinations.
sentence.Network_cn: 他出现无逻辑的, 妄想的, 幻听的症状.

sentence.Network_en: They have agreed to stop me if I get delusional.
sentence.Network_cn: 假如我产生错觉,他们已同意会阻止我.
